thread.section_title: Energia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Energia | energia.ie
thread.title: GEZ

author: GEZ
title: GEZ
text: Switching was simple as always online! I managed to get 33% off offer which suited me for electricity only. Had my first proper bi-monthly bill last month and did save 33% on my previous provider for same amount of units used in same period. The standing charges, etc are much the same as previous provider which I had already checked before switching so making a real saving. Easy to access my bills and submit meter readings when required online. Therefore, 5 star Energia!
